topic: Deep dive: bz2 standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: bz2 standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: bz2 Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: An in-depth look at the enhanced functionalities and improvements of the bz2 compression module in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Support for concurrent decompression using multiple worker threads
Integration with asyncio for asynchronous decompression tasks
New bz2file context manager for simpler file handling

code_examples.code:
with bz2.open('compressed_file.bz2', mode='rb') as f:
   decompressed = f.read().decode('utf-8')

import asyncio
async def bz2decompress(bz2_file):
   async for data in bz2_file:
       yield data.decode('utf-8')

bz2_bytes = await bz2.open('compressed_file.bz2', mode='rb')
decompressed = await bz2decompress(bz2_bytes)

caveats: Requires Python 3.12 or later to utilize the enhanced features and functionalities
